app.sections.presentation.question: Need to download and convert a Youtube videos in mp3 format?
app.sections.presentation.description: Well look no more, Video Converter is a free tool that allow you to convert a Youtube videos to an mp3 file that you can save to your device.
app.sections.converter.title: Past a valid link of a youtube video in the box bellow to start the process.
app.modal.preferences.storage.selector.s: If Active, the folder selector will always be shown. Otherwise, the app will use the default storage location (downloads).
